effect.sun_moon: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
